PHP Transaction Client v1.6.1 API Specification
SUMMARY:  INNER | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL:  FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

Class TransactionResponse

The TransactionResponse contains information about how the transaction was processed. Specifically, this includes the following.

  1. A response code, which is retrieved by calling getResponseCode().
  2. A text description with more detailed information about why the transaction succeeded or failed, which is retrieved by calling getResponseCodeText().
  3. The time at which the transaction was processed, which is retrieved by calling getTimeStamp().

To properly understand the role of class TransactionResponse, please read the Overview document.

Constructor Summary
TransactionResponse(String $argResponseString)
          The merchant system does not need to construct TransactionResponse objects. They are built automatically by the doTransaction() and doBatchTransaction() methods of the TransactionRequest object.

Constructor Detail

TransactionResponse

public TransactionResponse(String $argResponseString)
The merchant system does not need to construct TransactionResponse objects. Instead, TransactionResponse objects will be returned from TransactionRequest.doTransaction() and TransactionRequest.doBatchTransaction().
Method Detail

getAVSCode

getAVSCode()
A method to retrieve the AVS (Address Verification System) code. This method applies to responses received from the TransactionRequest.doTransaction() method. This field will only be set if your account on the Paygateway Payment System is configured to perform AVS checks. Note that if your account is configured for AVS checks, you must set a valid postal/zip code and bill address one on all AUTH, CAPTURE and SALE requests.
Returns:
String

getBankApprovalCode

getBankApprovalCode()
A method to retrieve the Bank Approval Code. This method applies to responses received from the TransactionRequest.doTransaction() method.
Returns:
String

getBatchBalanceState

getBatchBalanceState()
A method to determine if a closed batch is balanced or not. This method applies to responses from the TransactionRequest.doBatchTransaction() method. The state will be one of the following strings:
  • batch_balanced
  • batch_out_of_balance
  • batch_not_yet_balanced

 

Returns:
String

getBatchID

getBatchID()
A method to retrieve the batch ID. This method applies to responses from the TransactionRequest.doTransaction() and TransactionRequest.doBatchTransaction() methods.
Returns:
String

getBatchState

getBatchState()
A method to get the state of the batch. This method applies to responses from the TransactionRequest.doBatchTransaction() method. The state will be one of the following strings:
  • batch_open
  • batch_closed
  • batch_opening
  • batch_closing

 

Returns:
String

getCreditCardVerificationResponse

getCreditCardVerificationResponse()
A method to retrieve the credit card verification response. This method applies to responses received from the TransactionRequest.doTransaction() method. This field will only be set if your account on the Paygateway Payment System is configured to perform credit card verification value checks.
Returns:
String

getCreditTotal

getCreditTotal()
A method to retrieve the credit total for the batch. This method applies to responses from the TransactionRequest.doBatchTransaction() method.
Returns:
Double

getISOCode

getISOCode()
A method to retrieve the ISO code. This method applies to responses received from the TransactionRequest.doTransaction() method.
Returns:
String

getProperty

getProperty(String $argKey)
A method to retrieve a value that has already been set for this object. This method should not be called directly by the merchant.

Parameters:
String $argKey - POST key.
Returns:
String

getReferenceID()
A method to retrieve the reference ID. This method applies to responses received from the TransactionRequest.doTransaction() method.
Returns:
String

Method to retrieve the response code. This method applies to responses from the TransactionRequest.doTransaction() and TransactionRequest.doBatchTransaction() methods.

getResponseCodeText()

String

getRetryRecommended

getRetryRecommended()
Method to get retry flag. This method applies to responses from the TransactionRequest.doTransaction() and TransactionRequest.doBatchTransaction() methods.
Returns:
 String

getTimeStamp

getTimeStamp()
Method to determine when the transaction was processed. Specified as the number of milliseconds from the epoch (midnight GMT, January 1st, 1970). This method applies to responses from the TransactionRequest.doTransaction() and TransactionRequest.doBatchTransaction() methods.
Returns:
 String

getTimeString

getTimeString()
Get the time stamp in a human readable form. (Day Month Date, Year Hour:Minute:Second). This method applies to responses from the TransactionRequest.doTransaction() and TransactionRequest.doBatchTransaction() methods.
Returns:
 String

setProperty

setProperty(String $argKey, String $argValue)
A method to set a key value pair to be sent to the transaction server when the transaction is executed. This method should not be called directly by the merchant.

Parameters:
String $argKey - POST key.
String $argValue - POST value.
